Articles.Content: Would we be able to get an update for DOE 1.6.1? Thanks!

Hey folks, awesome mod. Question -- is there a way with this mod to prevent viewing other planets in the mapview until after they've been "discovered" with a telescope? Some way to prevent KAC from "knowing" of any transfer windows until after a planet has been discovered? Something to force me to launch a telescope and view, for example, Duna, before any probe / kerballed missions to Duna become possible?

For that matter, could we come up with some reasons to place telescopes in orbit of the other planets, or low Kerbolar (solar) orbit? Perhaps in conjunction with an extra-planets mod that involves other stars to go visit, necessitating placing a telescope out beyond Eeloo first?

Is there already a way to "kinda" do some of this in conjunction with other mods?

Would we be able to get an update for DOE 1.6.1? Thanks!

Here you go!

- - - Updated - - -

Hey folks, awesome mod. Question -- is there a way with this mod to prevent viewing other planets in the mapview until after they've been "discovered" with a telescope? Some way to prevent KAC from "knowing" of any transfer windows until after a planet has been discovered? Something to force me to launch a telescope and view, for example, Duna, before any probe / kerballed missions to Duna become possible?

For that matter, could we come up with some reasons to place telescopes in orbit of the other planets, or low Kerbolar (solar) orbit? Perhaps in conjunction with an extra-planets mod that involves other stars to go visit, necessitating placing a telescope out beyond Eeloo first?

Is there already a way to "kinda" do some of this in conjunction with other mods?

I think there's a mod that does exactly that. I can't remember the name offhand though. Once I get to the point where I can actively develop CactEye, I can look into integrating with other mods, such as with Asteroid Day (I know CactEye already has an asteroid camera).

Hey folks, awesome mod. Question -- is there a way with this mod to prevent viewing other planets in the mapview until after they've been "discovered" with a telescope? Some way to prevent KAC from "knowing" of any transfer windows until after a planet has been discovered? Something to force me to launch a telescope and view, for example, Duna, before any probe / kerballed missions to Duna become possible?

For that matter, could we come up with some reasons to place telescopes in orbit of the other planets, or low Kerbolar (solar) orbit? Perhaps in conjunction with an extra-planets mod that involves other stars to go visit, necessitating placing a telescope out beyond Eeloo first?

Is there already a way to "kinda" do some of this in conjunction with other mods?

You're thinking of Research Bodies http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127533-1-0-4-ResearchBodies-v1-4-Track-celestial-bodies-to-explore-them!-%28August-26th-2015%29
Yeah, CactEye + Asteroid Day + Research Bodies integration is my personal little dream for telescopes in KSP

Yeah, CactEye + Asteroid Day + Research Bodies integration is my personal little dream for telescopes in KSP

I'll second this
I really want to use this mod but my second attempt and I still can't get the gui to work. I click the gui button and nothing happens.
does this work with modded planets?

does this work with modded planets?

Yes. The ScienceDefs only have flavor text for the stock bodies but there's a generic line of copy that's used for non-stock bodies.
does this work with 1.0.4, and if so, could the title be changed to reflect this?

does this work with 1.0.4, and if so, could the title be changed to reflect this?

It does. However, I haven't gotten to test the occulsion experiment. Is it fixed yet?

Would it be possible to disable the distant object enhancement flare even when the target body is off screen?

When I was trying to snap a picture of Laythe I zoomed in to the point that Tylo went offscreen. This re-enabled Tylo's flare and thus drowned out my entire screen.

Hmm I had this same issue today. I ended up having to turn off flares for a bit. It worked great at first, but as I zoomed in more the flares kept turning on and would turn off if I unzoomed a bit. Is there any sort of range limitation I do play with a increase system size 7x SMA? Another thing was the flare was stuck on in the telescope and I had to enable then disable again for it to finally disappear. Then the whole planet, Jool, disappeared. Not sure what caused that and I didn't even get it to go back during that test. Will play around some more and hopefully get some decisive info. Really love the mod so I hope I get it figured out. Thanks!

Edited October 1, 2015 by Svm420
Are there any plans to index this mod to CKAN?

Hey folks

I've been super busy getting Pathfinder ready with its nice Buffalo MSEV, and just released DSEV, so I have a bit of time to do some maintennance on the CactEye. I'll have to create a new thread for the CactEye. One goal I have is to make a clean bridge for DOE. It sounds like there are still some bugs in the system; I need help to track them down as I've inherited the mod instead of writing the code from scratch. Fortunately I'm pretty good at stepping through somebody else's code; I do that at work

Hey folks

I've been super busy getting Pathfinder ready with its nice Buffalo MSEV, and just released DSEV, so I have a bit of time to do some maintennance on the CactEye. I'll have to create a new thread for the CactEye. One goal I have is to make a clean bridge for DOE. It sounds like there are still some bugs in the system; I need help to track them down as I've inherited the mod instead of writing the code from scratch. Fortunately I'm pretty good at stepping through somebody else's code; I do that at work

Awesome! Please be sure to post the new thread here so I (and others) can follow you there.

Hey folks

I've inherited this mod

Well fry my crabs and call me Maximus, that is an awesome NEWS!!! First you make glorious Pathfinder, and now you take over this mod! Wooo!!!

Well fry my crabs and call me Maximus, that is an awesome NEWS!!! First you make glorious Pathfinder, and now you take over this mod! Wooo!!!

The Minmus Resort will crack some fireworks today to celebrate
Been down with a cold so I haven't had the time I expected to dig into the CactEye over the weekend. But expect to see a new thread tonight after I get home from work.
Here is the new thread!

I got an error tying to take a picture of Ike in the CactEye GUI. In the console it said something about missing module ModuleLiftngSurface.SetupCoefficents. After pulling up the console to see what the error was about I could not close the console.
So why doesn't the GUI button work still?

I'm noticing a compatibility issues with this mod.
1.0.5 doesn't like me using wide-feild cameras for carrer mode, and gave me the error message to go here

Any ideas? Edited November 25, 2015 by AlexTheNotSoGreat
Have you tried the latest on the release thread? I need to update to oatest DoE as well
Nope, I tried it, and the error is still popping up.

I keep getting crashes with this mod, but don't really see anything in the logs that means anything.
